paragraph.value: noun comparatives is on RELATIVE (Bagherinezhad et al., 2016), presented in Table 5.  We report the results of the original work, where the best score used a combination of visual and textual signals, achieving 83.5% accuracy. We also tested the method by Yang et al. (2018) on this dataset.  The accuracy achieved by this method is 85.8%, surpassing the previous method by more than 2 points. We evaluated our method on this dataset, achieving a new state-of-the-art result of 87.7% accuracy with k = 10 as a filter method.
